Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for static resources (things that stay the same throughout the entire program execution), like constants and hardware.

    Use these resources in other files by adding this line at the top (see examples):

    import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources.*;

      • SERVER_IP

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_IP
        The IP address of the server that sends data to the robot. For the beta demo and competition, replace this line with

        public static final String SERVER_IP = DEFAULT_SERVER_IP;
